answers.answer: As long as it's not a daily occurrence you're fine. Everything in moderation. If you feel like a pizza and some fries go for it! As long as your weight gain is deemed healthy by your doc/midwife and you're not a gestational diabetes mama you're okay.

No food can harm ur baby really but that kind of food can give u really bad heart burn but ur pregnant and if u don't eat food u like or want the baby will punish u just try not to eat foods that aren't cooked all the way like meat or eggs

Tbh I live off junk food and I haven't had a single thing wrong with my pregnancy I'm 28 weeks I'm overweight and I smoke but my baby is healthy weight height and I've gained the right amount of weight from the baby as long as u drink plenty of milk and water u should be ok

I think there is a bacteria on lunch meat or some kind of unpasteurized cheese that can cause your baby to go blind..so food cant necessarily but bacteria from some foods can hurt your baby but not pizza or fries ull hurt your figure at most lol

question: I ate little ceasers pizza today and ate a medium fry from mc donalds you think this could harm my baby? I'm 18w2d.
title: Just Curious?
